name: Snowdown
description:
Snowdown

NB! This game is included in the C64 Xmas Bundle, but we have priced it at $5 here, so you can still buy it separately anyway if you like. Please head over to the C64 Xmas Bundle for 15 excellent C64 games for the tantalizingly cheap price of $5. If you already own Showdown, then Snowdown will be included in that release in a little while.

Snowdown is a 1 or 2-player Christmas themed action shooter for the Commodore 64, released in 2020.  Snowdown is an Xmas version of our newly released game Showdown. 

The game is inspired by a host of older titles with the same theme, going all the way back to Gun Fight from 1975.

You play a Santa out to win a fierce gun duel. The first one to outwit and knock down the opponent 5 times is the winner of the duel.

Giddy-up and get ready to fight!

Instructions:

Each canon can carry 5 snowballs. You reload by manually replacing the snowballs with a click of the joystick button, or you can pick up snoball packs from the ground. But beware! If your opponent catches you out of the safety of the cacti, then you might get knocked down!

Explosive crates appear around the play area. They explode when shot, so better stay away from them if you value you life, cowboy!

The game is best when played with a frenemy. It is a lot of fun to taunt a friend as they hit the ground and you win the Snowdown!

F7 can be used to exit the current game and go back to the title screen. Just in case you choose a 2-player game and you friend doesn't show up for the snowball duel!

Controls:

Joystick in port 2 for 1-player games.

Download now, for the minimum price of $5, and get ready to fight!

NB! Showdown has been published on cassette by Bitmap Soft! Pre-orders are now available at: https://www.bitmapsoft.co.uk/product/showdown/

Works on: Actual C64 hardware, PAL and NTSC, TheC64 Mini and Maxi, C64 emulators for many modern platforms.
